(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNS People))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBN confused)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP (DT the) (NN way) (NN I) (NN rate) (NN food))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubjpass(confused-4, People-1)
aux(confused-4, have-2)
auxpass(confused-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, confused-4)
prep(confused-4, about-5)
det(food-10, the-6)
nn(food-10, way-7)
nn(food-10, I-8)
nn(food-10, rate-9)
pobj(about-5, food-10)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN so)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP want)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB help)
              (NP (PRP you))))))
      (, ,))))

          (NP (DT the) (NN end))
          (PP (IN of)

    (. .)))

    (. .)))

        (, ,)))))
